Deprecation changes:
- [`brew audit` checks for `go get` usage](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2562)
- [`brew tap` warns on tapping deprecated, official taps](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2480)
- [More Homebrew internal APIs have been deprecated](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2522)
- [`brew audit` checks dependencies don't use options](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2482)
- [`brew audit` checks new formulae don't use patches](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2479)
- [`brew audit` checks for more universal usage](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2477)
- [`brew audit` checks for use of language module requirements](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2473)

Changes:
- [The Homebrew `curl` user agent is consistent with Safari again](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2555)
- [`brew install` recommends `brew upgrade` where appropriate](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2547)
- [`brew search` uses a single HTTP call for all tap searches](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2540)
- [Rubocop now checks the order of methods in formulae rather than requiring `brew audit --strict` be run](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2465)
- [Hide sensitive tokens in the environment from `brew install` and `brew test`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2524)
- [`brew readall --aliases` checks for shadowed aliases](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2108)
- [`brew edit` works correctly with environment filtering enabled (`HOMEBREW_ENV_FILTERING`)](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2476)
- [`brew search` searches all caskroom taps](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2254)
- [`brew install` doesn't search for formulae when the formula file is unreadable](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2502)
- [`brew audit` provides `--only` and `--except` to allow selectively running audit methods](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2478)
- [`brew create` uses GitHub metadata to populate fields when possible](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2481)
- [`brew uses` allows running on deleted formulae](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2475)
- [`brew install` does not search taps when a fully qualified formula is missing](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2498)

- [`brew audit`: don't recommend version aliases for `devel` versions](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2483)
- [Xcode 8.3.1 is the latest version](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2474)
- [Missing formula detection doesn't error on formulae with no tap](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2471)
- [Fix bad relocation of symlinks causing some bottles to not be `cellar :any` that otherwise could be](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2442)
- [`brew audit` handles `desc` rules with `rubocop`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2242)
- [`brew update` doesn't show installed formulae as new](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2452)
- [Dylib IDs containing metavariables are relocated again](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2450)

- [Support Xcode 8.3](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2412)
- [`brew install` doesn't error on a missing `INSTALL_RECEIPT.json`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2441)
- [`brew uninstall` removes all alias symlinks](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2433)
- [`depends_on :ruby` prepends the correct `PATH`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2403)
- [`brew cleanup` continues on errors when removing keg](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2374)
- [`brew` commands no longer fail due to removed formulae](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2422)
- [`brew` commands no longer fail due to removed aliases](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2421)
- [Tap migration messaging correctly handles new Cask names](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2419)
- [`brew outdated` outputs pinned formulae versions](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2401)
- [`brew doctor` checks for the new minimum Git version (1.8.5)](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2413)
- [`brew doctor` checks the `homebrew/core` git remote](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2398)
- [`brew install` no longer installs `default_formula` if a requirement is satisfied without it](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2389)
- [`brew migrate` allow the new formula name cellar to exist already](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2359)
- [`brew link` tells users of `--force` about `opt`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2372)
- [Missing formulae's reason is made more explicit](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1732)
- [`brew install` upgrades requirement formulae when necessary](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2348)
- [`brew update` migrates any unmigrated formulae](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2370)
- [`brew update` does not show migrated formulae as deleted](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2369)
- [`brew cask outdated` is a new command that shows outdated Casks](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2309)
- [`brew update` autoupdates no longer taps with no formulae](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2322)

- [Missing command flags and descriptions were added to man pages](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2272)
- [http://docs.brew.sh uses https://brew.sh theming](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2266)
- [`brew tests` runs all cask tests (replacing `brew cask-tests`)](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2260)
- [`depends_on :java` no longer considers `/usr/bin/java` to be enough to indicate an installed Java](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2244)

- [superenv  always filter flags on dependencies by default (again)](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2211)

- [Setting `HOMEBREW_ENV_FILTERING` will filter all environment variables from `brew`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1753)
- [`needs :cxx14` was added](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2112)
- [`depend_on :ruby` correct handles Ruby versions](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2083)
- [`brew uninstal` is an alias for `brew uninstall`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2084)
- [`brew install` creates symlinks in `opt` for formulae aliases](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1192)

- [`brew bump-formula-pr` now blocks duplicate pull requests by default](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1997)
- [`brew log` follows renamed formulae](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1995)
- [`brew --prefix` uses use `opt` links (again) when appropriate](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1994)

- [`brew reinstall` now warns when reinstalling with invalid options](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1951)
- [Formulae that are invalid Ruby are now handled better](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1943)

- [`brew update`: note in `man brew` that migrations may be performed](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1931)

- [`brew` unsets `GREP_OPTIONS` to fix stable tag updates](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1861)
- [New download strategies were added for better handling private GitHub repositories](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1763)
- [`brew deps --tree` had the gap in lines between requirements and dependencies removed](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1707)
- [`brew linkapps` and `brew unlinkapps` have been deprecated](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1808)
- [Xcode and XQuartz prioritise installations in the default location when present](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1816)

- [Formulae are read from the `HOMEBREW_PREFIX/opt` when otherwise unavailable](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1812)

- [`brew bump-formula-pr` has a better error message when a `url` is missing](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1807)
- [Revert superenv filtering flags on dependencies by default](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1796)
- [`brew audit` `env :std` and `env :userpaths` are now deprecated for new formulae.](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1775)

- [New GitHub Pages site for documentation based on Homebrew/brew `docs` folder](http://docs.brew.sh)

- [XCode 8.2 is now stable](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1659)

- [Deprecate `Utils::JSON` in favor of `JSON` from Ruby's core library](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1542)
- [`brew audit`: check formulae names against the blacklist](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1540)
- [Add `llvm_clang` compiler support to build formulae with the `clang` from the `llvm` formula (e.g. for OpenMP support without GCC)](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1130)
- [`brew install`: suppress duplicated warnings when `depends_on` a `Requirement`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1537)
- [`brew uninstall`: ignore deprecations when uninstalling to allow uninstalling e.g. formulae using `sha1`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1529)
- [`brew bump-formula-pr`: add a `--message` option to append to the pull request body](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1512)
- [`brew list`: follow aliases](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1520)

- [`brew audit` now considers `version_scheme` when compare versions](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1493)
- [`brew install` now warns about invalid, ignored build options](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1217)
- [`brew reinstall`, `brew upgrade` and `brew install`ing dependencies now correctly filters out no-longer existing options which unnecessary avoided bottles/binary packages](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1488)
- [`brew doctor` and `brew update` now checks the `var/homebrew/locks` directory is writeable](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1486)
- [`brew` commands no longer warn on an old formula name that's already been installed](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1485)
- [`brew cask` now supports using the `SUDO_ASKPASS` for running as `root`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1481)
- [`brew uninstall` now refuses to install a package if other packages that depend on it are still installed](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1082)
- [`brew` no longer requires write-access to `HOMEBREW_REPOSITORY` to run developer commands](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1466)
- [`brew cask` can no longer be run as `root`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1476)
- [`brew linkage` no longer complains about missing weak library links](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1460)

Breaking changes:
- [Disable SHA-1 checksum support in formulae](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1451)
- [Disable running Homebrew as the `root` user](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1452)
- [Bottles with `_or_later` tags no longer use `_or_later` in their filenames so the existing bottle can be reused](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1446)

Changes:
- [Stop `brew doctor` complaining about Symantec Endpoint Protection libraries](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1438)
- [Add support for migrating fully-scoped tap formulae names to other taps and print deprecation notices on migrated/renamed formulae](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1371)
- [Print less warnings on `brew install` run and instead print them after failures. Allow running with outdated development tools (as long as they aren't too outdated)](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1443)
- [`brew` displays message when auto-update has been running for 3 seconds without completion](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1413)
- [Stop `brew doctor` complaining about SentinelOne libraries](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1440)
- [When GitHub API scopes are missing output which ones are required](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1370)

- [Mark Xcode 8.1 as no longer a prerelease](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1384)
- [Improve output when Git is not installed](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1380)
- [Fix Homebrew Cask's restarting of incomplete downloads](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1377)
- [Improve speed of pouring/extracting bottles/binary packages](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1253)
- [Add a `brew cask reinstall` command](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1248)
- [Ensure `brew install` correctly prunes build-only recursive dependencies](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1305)
- [Make `brew outdated` better group versions of same formula](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1331)
- [Add a `brew release-notes` developer command.](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1310)
- [Add options to `brew info` dependencies output](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1308)

- [Better support the system Git on old OS X versions](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1304)
- [Use BSD tar's libarchive LZMA support if available rather than needing to install `xz`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1279)
- [Add `brew tap-new` command for creating a new tap with a README and Travis CI configuration](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1277)
- [`brew doctor` now warns about `SSL_CERT_FILE` which can break `curl` on HTTPS connections](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1285)
- [Warn when people have a Cellar at `/usr/local/Homebrew/Cellar` as it stops them getting binary packages](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1262)
- [Speed up bottle/binary package creation and extracting](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1258)
- [Ensure `brew postinstall` provides access to the Homebrew repository when appropriate](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1261)
- [Allow `brew --prefix` to be run as `root` without a warning](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1255)

- [Fix `brew tests` failing when `HOMEBREW_VERBOSE` is set](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1193)
- [Don't autoupdate on e.g.`brew install --help`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1190)
- [Deprecate Homebrew Cask's `license` DSL](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1235)
- [Improve Homebrew's user agent with no git repository](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1238)
- [`brew cleanup` now removes `GLIDE_HOME` cache directories](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1246)

- [`brew info` now also lists `Requirements` (e.g. `depends_on :foo`) as well as dependencies](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1004)
- [`brew bump-formula-pr` various usability enhancements](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/871)
- [Update the Rubocop configuration so it behaves as expected for Rubocop-supporting editors editing files in `Library/Taps`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1128)
- [`brew update` works better with older versions of `git`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1182)
- [`brew upgrade --all` has been a no-op for a while so tell people when it is run](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1202)
- [`brew install` no longer complains if Homebrew/brew is outdated](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1206)
- [External `brew` commands can now use `#:` comments to automatically have rich `--help` output](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1205)
- [`brew list` has a more expected exit code for `--verbose` and `--pinned`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1211)
- [Point to official external commands (`brew bundle`, `brew cask`, `brew services`) in the `brew.1` manpage](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1214)

- [`brew install -v` no longer prints `tar v` output](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1129)
- [Don't autochange Homebrew developers back to the `stable` branch from `master` in `brew update`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1142)
- [Better handle `brew remove` with no arguments](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1139)
- [`brew doctor` no longer complains about more than 24 hours since the last tag](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1152)

- [Stop developer users from getting "stuck" on an old tag](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1114)
- [Always use the `stable` branch for tagged checkouts](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1121)
- [Move `brew test-bot` to its own tap](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1122)
- [Use GitHub tags API for checking for tag updates](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1127)
- [Limit fatal development tools check to macOS Sierra and for non-CI environments](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/commit/12aad5c65fee39c5f044e39ca1efcbed58aebd39)

- [Fix some issues with bottles being created without files from `etc` or `var`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1100)
- [Don't allow using outdated developer tools](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1097)
- [Only update to official Homebrew semantically versioned tags](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1103)
- [Extend sandbox security for `/usr/local/Homebrew` installs](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1101)
- [Fix running `brew --version` outside `/usr/local/Homebrew`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1090)

- [Add `MacOS.release` compatibility layer for Casks](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1069)
- [Enable the macOS sandbox for more taps](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1074)
- [Ask for `sudo` access when necessary for migrating `Caskroom`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1064)
- [Don't print `git checkout` message when running `brew update`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1077)
- [Set HOMEBREW_VERSION automatically with `git describe`](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1076)
- [Fix an edge case when updating between tags](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/1060)

We've been working hard over the last year to make some major changes to Homebrew that we've been wanting for a long time. There have been some hiccups along the way but we now have a more stable base for using and developing Homebrew in future.

These include:
- [Homebrew package management and formulae (package metadata) split into separate repositories](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/2)
- [Homebrew Community site (using Discourse) for discussion](http://community.brew.sh)
- [Homebrew joined the Software Freedom Conservancy](https://sfconservancy.org/news/2016/feb/22/homebrew-joins/)
- [Homebrew's default repository installation location changed to `/usr/local/Homebrew` to keep your `/usr/local` cleaner](https://github.com/Homebrew/install/pull/60)
- [Homebrew/brew updates between release tags](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/998)
- [Homebrew CI and homebrew/core use the OS X sandbox for build-time security](https://github.com/Homebrew/legacy-homebrew/pull/38361)
- [Homebrew Cask integrated into Homebrew/brew](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/725)
- [Add new `brew bump-formula-pr` command to create new formula version pull requests](https://github.com/Homebrew/legacy-homebrew/pull/49848)
- [Add `brew --help` to `brew` subcommands](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/10)
- [Homebrew auto-updates when needed](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/50)
- [`brew update` sped up by only running `git fetch` if necessary](https://github.com/Homebrew/legacy-homebrew/pull/49219)
- Officially support [`brew bundle`](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-bundle) (for `Brewfile`s and import/export) and [`brew services`](https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-services) (for background services management).
- [Homebrew/brew passes tests on Linux and has generic backend for porting to other platforms in future](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/168)
- [Provide access to developer commands and `brew update` workflow automatically](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/881)
- [Use `curl` for all HTTP access for consistent proxy support](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/295)
- Use [new Ruby Macho library](https://github.com/Homebrew/ruby-macho) for reading and writing library macOS Mach O file locations.
- [Provide vendored, portable Ruby 2 binary for when system Ruby 2 is not available](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/404)
- [`HEAD` package installations have versions and can be upgraded](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/584)
- [Use Python virtualenvs to better handle Python dependencies](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/344)

And finally:
- [Improves formula not found handling](https://github.com/Homebrew/brew/pull/96)
